# The `PHIHandler` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Allows to correctly handle operands of the phi nodes based on the <code>Main</code> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> order of incoming basic blocks/values. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Allows to correctly handle operands of the phi nodes based on the <code>Main</code> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> order of incoming basic blocks/values.
